transcript:
Agent: Hello, is this Mr. Johnson?
Customer: Yes, it is. Who's calling?
Agent: My name is Emily, and I'm calling from GreenTech Solutions. We specialize in energy-efficient appliances.
Customer: Okay, what can you do for me?
Agent: We've recently launched a new line of smart thermostats that can help reduce your energy bills by up to 30%.
Customer: That sounds interesting. I've been looking to upgrade my old thermostat.
Agent: Great! Our smart thermostat is Wi-Fi enabled, and you can control it remotely through our mobile app.
Customer: That's convenient. How much does it cost?
Agent: The price starts at $249, but we're currently offering a 10% discount for new customers.
Customer: Okay, that's a bit out of my budget. Do you have any financing options?
Agent: Yes, we do. We offer a 0% interest financing plan for 12 months.
Customer: That sounds good. Can you tell me more about the installation process?
Agent: Our installation team will take care of everything. It usually takes about an hour to install.
Customer: Alright, I think I'm interested. Can you send me a quote and more information?
Agent: Absolutely, I'll send you an email with all the details. Would you like me to follow up with you tomorrow?
Customer: Yes, that would be great. Thank you, Emily.
Agent: You're welcome, Mr. Johnson. I'll talk to you tomorrow.
